changeSet.author: mat_dev_user
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `USER_BONNIE_CONNECTION` ( `ID` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `USER_ID` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `REFRESH_TOKEN` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `ACCESS_TOKEN` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), FOREIGN KEY (`USER_ID`) REFERENCES USER(USER_ID) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
